posts.post_title: FS: T206's SGC Graded 5's, 4's & 3's Sovereign, SC Overstrike, etc. *MOVED TO EBAY*
posts.post_content:
The following SGC graded T206s are for sale.

PayPal (no fees) preferred. PayPal email: [url]jason@jasonstricker.com[/url]

SOLD
Overall (hands at waist) Sweet Caporal 350-460 OVERSTRIKE SGC 60 - SOLD
Smith Buffalo Sovereign 350 SGC 60 - SOLD
Pfeister Throwing Old Mill *Wet Sheet Transfer* SGC 55 - SOLD

STILL AVAILABLE
Powers Piedmont 150 SGC 60 - Now on eBay: [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/321207036232[/url]
Rudolph Portrait Sweet Caporal 350 SGC 50 - Now on eBay: [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/321207034284[/url]
Malarkey Portrait Sweet Caporal 350 SGC 40 - Now on eBay: [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/321207032639[/url]

Scans:

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/T206-Powers-Piedmont-150-SGC-60-small.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/T206-Rudolph-Sweet-Caporal-350-SGC-50-VGEX.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/T206-Malarkey-Sweet-Caporal-350-SGC-40-small.jpg[/IMG]

PayPal email: [url]jason@jasonstricker.com[/url]

Thank you!
